Event.Message: The file system structure on volume %2 has now been repaired.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeIdLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeIdLength"/> <data name="RepairDetail" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RepairDataLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="RepairData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="RepairDataLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system structure on volume %2 cannot be corrected.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeIdLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeIdLength"/> <data name="RepairDetail" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RepairDataLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="RepairData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="RepairDataLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system detected a checksum error and was able to correct it. The name of the file or folder is "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ObjectNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ObjectName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ObjectNameLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system detected a checksum error and was not able to correct it. The name of the file or folder is "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ObjectNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ObjectName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ObjectNameLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system was unable to write metadata to the media backing volume %2. A write failed with status "%3" ReFS will take the volume offline. It may be mounted again automatically.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeIdLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeIdLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: Volume %2 is formatted as ReFS but ReFS is unable to mount it; ReFS encountered status %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeIdLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeIdLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: Volume "%2" was mounted in an older version of Windows. Some features may be lost.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VolumeIdLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="VolumeId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VolumeIdLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SqmType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmSessionGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="SqmID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmDWORDDatapointValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SqmType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmSessionGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="SqmID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmStringDatapointValue" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SqmType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmSessionGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="SqmID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmProcessHashValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmStreamRowLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="SqmStreamRow" count="SqmStreamRowLength"> <data name="SqmTypeEntry" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmDWORDEntry" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmStringEntry" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </struct> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SqmType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmSessionGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="SqmID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmProcessHashValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmStreamRowLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmStreamEntriesSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmStreamEntries" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="SqmStreamEntriesSize"/> <data name="SqmStreamFlags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SqmType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmSessionGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="SqmID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SqmDWORD64DatapointValue" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system detected a corruption on a file. The file has been removed from the file system namespace. The name of the file is "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ObjectNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ObjectName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ObjectNameLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system detected a corruption on a file. The file system may have failed to remove it from the file system namespace. The name of the file is "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ObjectNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ObjectName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ObjectNameLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system detected a corruption on a folder. Contents of the folder have been removed from the file system namespace. The name of the folder is "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ObjectNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ObjectName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ObjectNameLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system detected a corruption on a folder. The file system may have failed to remove contents of the folder from the file system namespace. The name of the folder is "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ObjectNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ObjectName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ObjectNameLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system detected a corruption on file system metadata. The name of the stream is "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ObjectNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ObjectName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ObjectNameLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: The file system detected a corruption on file system metadata. The name of the stream is "%2".
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ObjectNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ObjectName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ObjectNameLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: Volume "%2" detected a corruption on file system metadata. It will lose self-healing features.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ObjectNameLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ObjectName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ObjectNameLength"/> <data name="FailureReason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>
